Html:
Hi
I want to use these tools in a GIS software
When the number of layers , pints or shapes on the map is much
View rate decreases
If the drawing points and shapes can be done in a separate thread
This tool can be very good for large GIS app
Thank
what do you mean in separate thread? all rendering is done on main thread

hi
It is mean that rendering each component like point or shape must run in own thread.
When points and shapes of the page Increases,greatly reduced rate display performance.
Finally Poor show for applications with large data(GIS APP).
Thank
